ValidationRule.description: You must have an amount in the amount field before accepting an opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "1 - Demo"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "2- Evaluation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "3 - Negotiation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "3 - Closed Won")), ISBLANK( Amount ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot accept or close an opportunity without a figure in the Amount field.
